title: kaniya vENDum ayyA
sahitya:
kaniya vENdum ayyA en manam kanindun padamalarai n inaindu nidam pADa


anupallavi

  kanai kaDal karai amar kArtikEyanE pani mAmalai magaL maganE guhanE


caraNam    punitat-tanimaiyil paravi iruppavanE puLLik-kalApa mayil vaLLi uganadavanE
vinaigaLaik-kalaindiDum vEl koNDavanE un tuNai vENDi unai nADit-tudippOrin ANDavanE
